title: Pixel 6 Pro user spots Face Unlock feature during initial setup
content:
In the days leading up to the Pixel 6 series launch last year, we learned quite a bit about Google’s latest flagships. Leaks about the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro showcased their design, confirmed hardware specifications, and even highlighted some of the new software features. While most of these leaks were accurate, leaks suggesting

The post Pixel 6 Pro user spots Face Unlock feature during initial setup appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A Reddit user has spotted the unreleased Face Unlock option while setting up their new Pixel 6 Pro, but the feature isn't live yet.
